overview: Quattro - the Full Story examines the history of the legendary machines using archive and new footage. It charts the rise of the groundbreaking 4WD model and follows its progress from humble beginnings to the glory years of rallying and beyond. Designers, drivers and team managers are interviewed about their roles in developing the classic car and there is plenty of rally race action.A fascinating portrait of one of motorsportâ€™s fastest and most popular marques.
title: Audi Quattro: The Full Story
